General.Name: Soosung Innovation Co. Ltd.
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Soosung Salvacion co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of material handling equipment in South Korea and internationally. The company offers material handling equipment, such as electric forklift trucks, engine powered forklift trucks, pallet trucks, tow tractors and platform trucks, electric elevating platform, stackers, drum handling equipment, lift tables, and cranes, as well as customized equipment. It also provides cleaning equipment including, walkie scrubber, sit-down scrubber, and sit-down sweepers. The company was formerly known as Ev Soosung. Co., Ltd and changed its name to Soosung Salvacion co., Ltd. in January 2023. Soosung Salvacion co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in Incheon, South Korea.

2.Name: Gwon-Ho  Kim
2.Title: Head of Laboratory and Gen. Director of Laboratory
